Incorporate these elements: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: Tie flashcards to discussion (least privilege trade-offs), peer teaching (model comparisons), problem-solving (SolarWinds forensics sim). - Scaffolding Layers: Distribute coverage: 30% Layer 1, 25% Layer 2, 25% Layer 3, 20% Layer 4. [INSERT FULL LAYER DESCRIPTIONS FROM ABOVE] - Key Content: Definitions (AC, AAA), Models (DAC/RBAC/ABAC), NIST SP 800-53 Rev. 5 AC controls (AC-2, AC-3, AC-6), SP 800-53A Rev. 5 assessments, zero-trust, chain-of-custody, SolarWinds example. Prerequisites: Authentication basics. Use EXACTLY this schema for each flashcard as JSON objects in an array: { "id": 1, "bloom_level": "REMEMBER", "layer": 1, "front": "Question here", "back": { "answer": "Answer here", "explanation": "Rationale + example + reference", "references": ["NIST SP 800-53 Rev. 5"] }, "type": "MCQ" or "Q/A", "mcq_options": [...] if MCQ, "distractors_explained": [...] if MCQ } Follow distractor protocol: [INSERT FULL PROTOCOL FROM SCHEMA].
